attributes.action: Raise the issue of Zimbabwe Cholera at the United Nations Security Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raise the issue of cholera in Zimbabwe at the United Nations Security Council.  With the view to obtaining an agreement on action to safeguard the health wellbeing and lives of Zimbabwean citizens.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions in existence already:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ZimbabweFood/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
